law.catch_line: Liability of officer, manager, agent, or employee of broker.
law.text: Every member of a firm of brokers and every officer, manager, agent, or employee of a broker, who knowingly does consent to the doing of any act prohibited by KRS 434.320 or 434.330 shall be guilty of a Class D felony.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 463, sec. 50, effective July 14, 1992. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1376kk-4.
